sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Parallax, ParallaxLayer } from 'react-spring/renderprops-addons' import '../../styles/main.css' import csharp from '../../assets/csharp-logo.svg' import react from '../../assets/react-logo.svg' import docker from '../../assets/docker-logo.svg' import Console from '../../components/Console' const url = (name, wrap = false) => `${wrap ? 'url(' : ''}https://awv3node-homepage.surge.sh/build/assets/${name}.svg${wrap ? ')' : ''}` class Home extends Component { render() { return ( (this.parallax = ref)} scrolling={true}> ) } } export default Home
